lightmask.AmbientLightConfiguration.Cach: Comma-separated list of wall ids to cache for this light.
Switch to the Walls Layer and select walls to cache, then hit 'Cache selected walls' to cache those walls.
lightmask.AmbientLightConfiguration.Rela: Make cached walls move relative to the light when the light is moved.
lightmask.AmbientSoundConfiguration.Cach: Comma-separated list of wall ids to cache for this sound.
Switch to the Walls Layer and select walls to cache, then hit 'Cache selected walls' to cache those walls
lightmask.AmbientSoundConfiguration.Rela: Make cached walls move relative to the sound when the sound is moved.
